name: Astrun (Mahmoud_Official)
description:
You crashed on an alien planet!

Explore the planet and collect the scrap you need to repair your spaceship, and get out of there!

But be careful of the various aliens that you might face!

There are different weapons you can find:

Shotgun    Rifle    Lasergun

There are different planets with different environments that you can explore:

Sand    Fire    Ice

How To Play

! Open the crate on your right when you spawn !

Movement - A, D, Space

Shoot - LMB

Your oxygen tank gets used up every 60 seconds, refill it inside bases

E   N   J   O   Y
